nodes.bodyText: On master this list contains Boost and 'Apache log4cxx'. Seems log4cxx is not used anymore. Should this list maintain all currently used licenses for the ml project? The reason for the mismatch was that the checkMlCppNotice hasn't been executed for a while now I think
This is actually a change in behaviour from master as discussed here: https://elastic.slack.com/archives/C8UUBNASY/p1598283630030100
Just some minor cleanup on the way
Can we not use a TaskProvider here?

How much effort would it be to rework these implementations to not depend on the CLI tools and instead use Gradle provided archive operation APIs? As it if essentially if our logic to find tar or zip on the classpath breaks, we'd just start silently skipping these checks.
wasn't too much effort and made the plugin way simpler. 👍
Yay! Being able to easily test this stuff is probably the most compelling argument for migrating to binary plugins.
